question: Kanakalata Mohanty, the noted author has passed away. She was associated with which language?
explanation: Kanakalata Mohanty (82), the noted Odia author, has passed away in Bhubaneswar, Odisha  on February 26, 2018. She has written several novels, including \'Ete Andhara\', \'Kete Jwala\' and \'Anuradha\', and more than 100 short stories. She was also recognized by All India Radio (AIR) as a noted lyricist, particularly for her devotional songs on Lord Jagannath.
